EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Keith Chirico (1339942504.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Keith Chirico (1339942504.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Keith, Thank you for the reply, glad to hear we are on your radar. The webinar later this month has been our most successful in terms of registration to date. Going to be a huge turnout and we’ve been working on the content for weeks – should be a good one. Thanks for the update! Steve From: Keith Chirico [mailto:keith.chirico@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, June 14, 2012 11:35 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Keith Chirico Steven, Thanks for the follow-up...I still have MBO on my radar...signed up for a webinar at the end of the month and the IC Brief...looking forward to both. I am currently deployed in Afghanistan and hope to take the IC plunge by the end of the year. I will definitely keep you posted! Thanks again for staying in touch. Take care. Keith Keith ChiricoCJTF Paladin CJ9, C-IED ISRJIEDDO Detect/Integration POCCTR, Lanmark Tech, Inc.
On Thu, Jun 14, 2012 at 1:36 AM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com <mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Dear Keith, We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to follow up and get an update from you. We also are now publishing an Independent Consulting Brief. It's a monthly email that provides access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and best practices. You can sign up for it by going to http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Feel free to provide an update by simply replying to this email. Regards, Steven___________________________________Steve ArhancetDirector, Consultant ServicesMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6011 <tel:%28703%29%20793-6011>f: 703.793.6081 <tel:703.793.6081>e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com <mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgxNjQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1rZWl0aC5jaGlyaWNvQGdtYWlsLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMjAwMjYtMTEwMTAxOC0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons67JZKXonjHpfsX56uwsWaa%2BlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsFrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>
